item.title: Unemotional on all counts: Evidence of reduced affective responses in individuals with high callous-unemotional traits across emotion systems and valences
Roles of medial prefrontal cortex and orbitofrontal cortex in self-evaluation
Shared neural circuits for mentalizing about the self and others
